item.title: Migrate Azure AD Connect to Cloud Sync
item.description: Today we are going to migrate from Azure AD Connect to the new Cloud Sync agent.

item.title: How to onboard server to Azure Arc
item.description: Onboarding Windows servers to Azure Arc allows you to manage your on-premises and edge Windows servers using the same Azure portal and tools that you use for cloud-based servers.

item.title: Defender For Server - Licesning
item.description: This is a miniseries about Microsoft Defender for Server, this series will be around licenses/requirements this article, how to onboard Servers, and tips around troubleshooting.

item.title: Install Defender For Server the modern unified solution
item.description: Defender for Endpoint extends support to also include the Windows Server operating system.
